thread.title: Once Upon a Time's Emilie De Ravin announces she's expecting her first child - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Once Upon a Time's Emilie De Ravin announces she's expecting her first child - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Once Upon a Time's Emilie De Ravin announces she's expecting her first child - Showbiz
text: Congratulations are in order for Emilie de Ravin and Eric Bilitch, who have announced they are expecting their first child together.The Once Upon a Time star told Twitter users that the happy news was "a dream come true".I wanted to share some exciting news...me & @ericbilitch are expecting a baby!! 'Tis truly a dream come true and we could not be happier— Emilie de Ravin (@emiliederavin) October 3, 2015 Bilitch retweeted De Ravin's announcement and added: "Indeed! We are over the moon with joy! Could not be more excited to be starting a family with @emiliederavin."The couple have been dating for a year and the baby will be the first child for the pair.The actress was previously married to actor Josh Janowicz, but the pair announced their divorce in 2014 after 11 years of marriage. © ABC / Jack Rowand Former Lost star de Ravin currently appears as Lacey/Belle in Once Upon a Time.The ABC show recently announced it would be exploring an LGBT relationship throughout series five, but hasn't yet confirmed which characters would be involved.Fans have speculated that romance could be on the cards for Mulan (Jamie Chung) and Princess Aurora (Sarah Bolger).Once Upon a Time airs in the US on ABC on Sundays at 8pm ET.
